text:
WorkBenchGUI shows corrupted Japanese characters.
Font#getFontName() returns 
"dialog.bold", which is handled as "Arial" in jdk1.3.1_02(japanese).
Arial is not Japanese 
font.
Using  Font#getName() instead is one solution since it returns a logical font name.
